EmailTemplate.subject: Pernod Ricard Chatter® – External Granted Access
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
{!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_First_Name__c} {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Last_Name__c} – {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Company__c} has been granted access to the Chatter group {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Group_Name__c}.
The credentials to connect to Pernod Ricard Chatter® will be sent to {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Email__c} in a separate email.
Best regards,
Pernod Ricard Chatter® Team
